objects.text: Premium hand-crafted ensemble with exquisite jewelry set

product_details.name: Royal Heritage Bridal Collection - Luxury Traditional Wedding Ensemble
product_details.description:
• ✨ Premium red and emerald green embroidered bridal outfit with intricate detailing
• 💎 Exquisite kundan and pearl-studded choker necklace set with matching earrings
• 🧵 Hand-crafted zari embroidery with crystal embellishments
• 👗 Rich silk fabric with traditional paisley and floral motifs
• 💫 Designer embroidered border with emerald green contrast
• 🎀 Perfect blend of contemporary style and traditional aesthetics
• ✅ Includes matching jewelry set with intricate gold-plated craftsmanship
• 🌟 Ideal for wedding ceremonies and grand traditional occasions
• 📏 Custom sizing available
• 🛍️ Comes with preservation guidelines and storage bag

banner_details:
The banner features a luxurious and regal design highlighting a high-end bridal collection. It has a rich gradient background transitioning from deep maroon to dark green, overlaid with subtle golden radial and linear gradients, and elegant geometric patterns including concentric circles and bordered corners. Central to the design is a fashion image showcasing a traditional bridal look in red and gold attire. The top of the banner presents a bold headline (`heading`) in a classic serif font with gold fill, followed by a refined subheading (`subheading`) that introduces the collection. Below the model's image, a descriptor text (`description`) outlines product elegance, followed by a prominent golden price tag (`price`). At the bottom is a bold, dark red call-to-action button (`cta_background`) with gold "SHOP NOW" text (`cta`). The overall composition conveys sophistication and cultural heritage.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Maroon: #8B0000
- Forest Green: #1F4435
- Gold: #FFD700
- Off-white/Cream: #F9E79F
- Dark Red (CTA background): #800000
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a glamorous woman adorned in vibrant traditional attire, making red (#C8102E) the dominant and most striking color, projecting boldness and celebration. The deep green embroidery (#1C4B28) beautifully complements the red, offering a regal contrast. Golden jewelry and embellishments (#D4AF37) blend elegance and wealth, while enhancing the richness of the outfit. Her bold lipstick and nail polish match the red attire, maintaining visual harmony. The dark sunglasses (#2C2C2C) add a modern twist, subtly balancing the bright palette. Blending of colors is seamless yet distinct, making red and gold the highlights, ideal for an opulent advertisement banner.
